EmailTemplate.name: VinCamera Repair Form
EmailTemplate.subject: VinCamera Repair Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Attached to this email is the repair form.
You will want to send the VinCamera to the address below.
Please remove battery and memory card before sending.
<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
C.R.I.S. Service Center
250 N 54th Street
Chandler, AZ 85226
Phone - 480-940-1103
Should you have any questions or concerns please do not hesitate to contact me personally.
Thank you,
{!User.Name}
1-800-980-7488 {!User.Extension}
{!User.Email}
